Name: Truth: Disorder
About the game: Truth: Disorder is an exciting story about a guy named Thoru who once realizes that his whole life is a lie. The game will surprise you: - An interesting story full of mysteries and secrets. - Unexpected twists and turns in the plot. - Several bright characters, each of which is unique and in interaction with the hero.
